#summary How to get ASEPRITE source code.

You can clone the following git repository from github.com:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/dacap/aseprite.git
}}}

Also you can [://github.com/dacap/aseprite browse the source code online].

== Migrating from SF.net ==

If you have already the git repository cloned from SourceForge, you can switch the origin URL to the github one with the following command:

{{{git remote set-url origin git://github.com/dacap/aseprite.git}}}
